output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
crime <- readRDS("Module10/Crime3years.rds")
years <- crime %>% filter(Date %in% c(2018, 2019))
monthly_data <- years %>% group_by(month = format(Date, "%Y-%m")) %>% summarise(total_crime = sum(Battery))
saveRDS(monthly_data, "Crime2years_monthly.rds")
kable(monthly_data)

```
